answers.answer: I didn't have any pain under my ribs. Not sure about that one.
Ask your doctor. That could be a sign of preeclampsia, bit 8 weeks is super early...just make sure your Dr knows and keeps an eye on it
I had it under my left rib off and on for a couple of days around that time

Gallbladder?!  My went from random sharp pains wen to the er they though it was my asthma flaring up, it wasn't went back the next day in horrible pain it was my gallbladder. :( i was still in so much pain we drive to a bigger hospital, (30 minutes away)  the where giving me morphine and dilota (spelling?) Wasn't even helping with the pain, i was admitted and had emergency surgery the next day!I was only 10 weeks when i had the surgery, i am now 22+2 and baby is a OK! :)

question: Hey ladies is this common? I'm only 8weeks but since this morning I have that sharp pain under my right ribs its especially more painful when breathing. It's not accompanied by heartburn it's just uncomfortable and I have some burping tmi sorry.
title: Sharp pain under right ribs
